name: Maneki-Mancer
description:
Once upon a time there was a kingdom of cats.

These cats worshipped their national treasure... The Megadallion!

This magical coin gives the kingdom prestige, prosperity and good fortune.

One fateful night the Megadallion was stolen by the Prince of Rats.

In all the kingdom there was only one who could find the Megadallion.

Gamble the Magic Cat stepped up to the task,

"Fret not my friends! I shall return to you your treasure and restore the kingdom's greatness!"

Play as Gamble and use fight through various regions to chase down the Rat Prince and reclaim the kingdom's Megadallion! 

[INPUTS]

Use the arrow keys to move and collect coins

Use [space] to jump

Use [x] to fire coins

Use [c] over downed enemies to collect their stolen loot

[CREDITS]

Game Design, Art and Programming by HaywireJo

SFX from Kirby and the Amazing Mirror

BGM from PlayOnLoop.com

Good Luck and Have Fun! Thanks for playing my game.

-HaywireJo
